## 0.4.0 / 2013-12-11

### Improvements

* Create the nellie user a system user. ([@fnichol][])
* Pretty print JSON configuration. ([@fnichol][])


## 0.3.0 / 2013-12-10

### New features

* Preserve download filename and symlink current jar for execution. ([@fnichol][])


## 0.2.0 / 2013-12-10

* Initial release.
